column4: I'm actually running jolicloud right now, my windows setup is borked and I'm on a netbook, so I need to make a windows sd card. I know it's taboo to ask how to install windows from linux, but I have to ask
aside from using bartpe. i dont think you can install windows from SD..
jolicloud is a lightweight OS for netbooks, runs super fast, most of the apps are web 2.0 apps integrated into the system http://www.jolicloud.com/
